last_episode_to_air.name: The Gunshot Heard 'Round the World
last_episode_to_air.overview: A riff on film noir via a fever dream landscape that folds the audience in and out of narratives and a series of flashbacks, meticulously and abstractly threaded together by three protagonists. Series finale.

name: Cinema Toast
overview: This anthology series is a post-modernist reinvention of older movies that turns pre-existing imagery from the public domain on its head to tell brand new unique stories spanning genres including drama, horror and comedy.

episodes.name: Familiesgiving
episodes.overview: A young couple, John and Jane, have their sacred Friendsgiving upended when John’s overbearing mom forces an invite and makes it all about her. John, fearing his contentious mom will make a horrible scene as usual and ruin the holiday, decides to enlist his dad in a harebrained scheme to minimize the damage. Despite his best and most ridiculous efforts, things go off the rails anyway...

episodes.name: Report on the Canine Auto-Mechanical Soviet Threat
episodes.overview: A young boy falls victim to America’s biggest threat: the importation of reanimated Russian dog corpses that can communicate with machinery and vehicles.

episodes.name: Quiet Illness
episodes.overview: Johanna flashes in and out of fantasy as she grapples with her inescapable fate at the hands of her husband.

episodes.name: After the End
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of their latest kill, a team of monster hunters realizes the true monsters are amongst themselves.

episodes.name: The Cowboy President
episodes.overview: Loosely based on the true story of two operatives who went to the White House to determine if Ronald Reagan was mentally impaired. Instead, they found that he was severely depressed, watching movies all day and NOT doing his job—at all.

episodes.name: Kiss, Marry, Kill
episodes.overview: A sorcerer creates a potion that allows Vivian to shape-shift into any person and kiss, marry or kill anyone she pleases in a single day.

episodes.name: Warehouse Friends
episodes.overview: Workers in a big box warehouse facility decide to pursue better working conditions – they journey to a jungle river to confront their CEO, who is vacationing there.

episodes.name: Attack of the Karens
episodes.overview: Zombies are reimagined as suburban women with a lot of complaints.

episodes.name: One Gay Wedding and a Thousand Funerals
episodes.overview: After gay marriage is legalized, one man in a small town is determined that the only logical response is to convince the straight men and women to throw themselves off a tall ladder in protest.

episodes.name: The Gunshot Heard 'Round the World
episodes.overview: A riff on film noir via a fever dream landscape that folds the audience in and out of narratives and a series of flashbacks, meticulously and abstractly threaded together by three protagonists. Series finale.
